title: Alien on the Runway
description: Alien on the Runway: An Alien Series Prequel by Gini KochThe first meeting between a previously unidentified superhero and the aliens who will teach him...---------------------This is a short story prequel to the Katherine "Kitty" Katt series that gives readers the long awaited story of how Reader met Gower. It was published in the Penumbra eMag Superheroes issue in May 2014 and is not currently available to buy as a separate ebook.
author: Gini Koch
